mapper.sql: column_id as columnId, column_name as columnName, plaza_id as plazaId, level as level, parent_id as parentId, img_width as imgWidth, img_height as imgHeight, sort as sort, update_time as updateTime
mapper.select:
select
from m_column where del_flag = 'N'
and column_name like CONCAT('%',#{columnName},'%')

select
from m_column where del_flag = 'N'
and column_name like CONCAT('%',#{columnName},'%')
and plaza_id = #{plazaId}
order by sort asc

select t.column_id as columnId, t.column_name as columnName, t.plaza_id as plazaId, t.level as level, t.parent_id as parentId, t.img_width as imgWidth, t.img_height as imgHeight, t.sort as sort, t.update_time as updateTime, ( CASE WHEN (p.column_id = 0 OR p.column_id IS NULL) THEN '顶级' ELSE p.column_name END ) as parentName from m_column t left join m_column p on t.parent_id = p.column_id where t.del_flag = 'N' and t.column_id = #{columnId}
